data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Conversation thread identity and participant model". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Accidentally deletes availability rule, panics". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.
